name: Cancellable
desc: A protocol indicating that an activity or action supports cancellation.

items.name: func store<C>(in: inout C)
items.desc: Stores this cancellable instance in the specified collection.

items.name: func store(in: inout Set<AnyCancellable>)
items.desc: Stores this cancellable instance in the specified set.

items.name: func storeWhileEntityActive(Entity)
items.desc: Retains the Cancellable as long as the entity is active (see Entity.isActive). If the entity is deactivated, the Cancellable is released.
